headline: German students awarded 2025 Stockholm Junior Water Prize for flood warning innovation
summary: STOCKHOLM, August 26, 2025--Niklas Ruf and Jana Spiller from Germany received the prestigious Stockholm Junior Water Prize 2025 for their work on developing a scalable flood warning system for small streams. H.R.H. Crown Princess Victoria of Sweden presented the winners with their award during a ceremony at Stockholm City Hall as part of World Water Week in Stockholm.
